steps.title: Project discussion
steps.description: Contact me in any convenient way and tell me about your project

steps.title: Technical specification
steps.description: We create detailed specifications with functionality, technologies and timelines

steps.title: Estimation and contract
steps.description: I provide cost and timeline estimates, we sign a contract

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I start working on the project with regular progress reports

steps.title: Testing and delivery
steps.description: We test the finished solution and deliver it to you with documentation
